body: Since our staff applications on the "Staff applications" category is not there anymore, how will I know if I get accepted for an interview or not? If I do make it through the interviews, how will I know if I get accepted to be a Jr mod?
body_tagged: Since our staff applications on the "Staff applications" category is not there anymore, how will I know if I get accepted for an interview or not? If I do make it through the interviews, how will I know if I get accepted to be a Jr mod?
title: How will I???

replies.body: The Staff Applications as well as the old forums will be brought back eventually, please be patient.
replies.body_tagged: The Staff Applications as well as the old forums will be brought back eventually, please be patient.

replies.body: I know, but will they email us or something?
replies.body_tagged: I know, but will they email us or something?

replies.body: I'm assuming a discussion will appear showing all the people that were accepted.
replies.body_tagged: I'm assuming a discussion will appear showing all the people that were accepted.

replies.body:
One of the high ranking staff members such as Howsie22 or AviGill will probably make a new discussion about it.

EDIT : Sorry, I didn't see Cupcake1241's post; same thing.
